text.div:
Spinal Cord Injury

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-9-cm
    Code Display
    806.00 Closed fracture of C1-C4 level with unspecified spinal cord injury
